# Creating a GitHub repository

We need to create a repository, to do so navigate in your browser to GitHub page and click on *new* button, as indicated bellow

```{r echo=FALSE, eval=TRUE}
knitr::include_graphics(here::here("figures", "Git1.png"))

```

# Cloning the repository


Copy the **https** from your remote repository
```{r echo=FALSE, eval=TRUE}
knitr::include_graphics(here::here("figures", "Git3_clone.png"))
```

# Connecting the repo with local machine

```{r echo=FALSE, eval=TRUE}
knitr::include_graphics(here::here("figures", "Git3_Rstudio.png"))
```

Paste the URL from github
```{r echo=FALSE,eval=TRUE}

```
